definition: to make clear/to make known/to state clearly/to indicate/known
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: Her arms showed green patches, indicating heavy internal bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 她的胳膊出現了青斑，表明有嚴重的內出血。

sentences.english: Post-simulation shows that the deserializer meets the design requirements.
sentences.chinese: 後仿真結果表明，本文設計的串並轉換電路滿足要求。

sentences.english: The results indicated that interfacial charge transfer may be the rate limiting step.
sentences.chinese: 分析表明界面的電荷轉移是反應的速度控制步。

sentences.english: The two fish of Pisces show Christianity's split between spirit and matter.
sentences.chinese: 雙魚宮的兩條魚表明基督教的靈性與物質的分離。

sentences.english: As it turns out, a handful of scientific studies show that chicken soup really could have medicinal value.
sentences.chinese: 而且幾項科學研究也表明，雞湯的確具有藥用價值。

sentences.english: The last lane is Method, indicating where the lock contends.
sentences.chinese: 最後一列是方法，表明鎖競爭是在什麼位置發生的。

sentences.english: Thermodynamic parameters depict the endothermic nature of adsorption and the process is spontaneous.
sentences.chinese: 熱力學參數表明，吸附過程是自發的和吸熱的。

sentences.english: It was found that giant pandas in Fopinghad tke habit of seasonal vertical movement.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，佛坪大熊貓有季節性垂直移動習性。

sentences.english: It is shown that the conducting time of the power converter transistor should not be too short.
sentences.chinese: 實驗表明，功率管的導通時間不宜太短。

sentences.english: Correlation analysis showed there was relationship between pet owning and health.
sentences.chinese: 相關分析表明，是否擁有寵物犬與身心健康顯著相關。

sentences.english: The experimental data showed that the results were better than those determined by partial least squares.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，經小波變換後處理結果回收率明顯提高。

sentences.english: The design problems of hatch cover and cantilever beam were solved to check the usefulness of the suggested method.
sentences.chinese: 艙口蓋及懸樑的設計結果表明瞭該方法的可行性。

sentences.english: Experiment results show that those approaches have good real -time performance and vivid effect.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果表明，該算法達到了較好的實時性和真實感。

sentences.english: It made clear that temperature is an important influence factor for flesh color and senescence of fruits under storage.
sentences.chinese: 這表明溫度對採後梅果果肉色澤及衰老有很大的影響。

sentences.english: Sequence analysis showed that it contained the basic characteristic of primary structure of promoter.
sentences.chinese: 對其序列分析表明它具有啓動子初級結構的基本特徵。

sentences.english: There are myelinated and unmyelinated fibers in alligator's optic nerve.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，視神經中可見有髓纖維和無髓纖維。

definition: to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
proof/certificate/identification/testimonial/CL:個|个[ge4]/to prove/to testify/to confirm the truth of
to confirm (sth to be true)/to verify
to show/to illustrate/to display/to demonstrate
to hint/to suggest/suggestion/hint
to signify/to mean/to imply
evidence/proof/to confirm/corroboration
opposite/contrary
outstanding/notable/remarkable/statistically significant
mark/indication/sign/indicator
and/besides/moreover/furthermore/in addition
conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)/it is (thus) clear/clear/visible
clear/distinct/obvious
to indicate/to point out
from this, it can be seen that...
